title: Inception
synopsis: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is tasked with planting an idea into a target's mind.
trivia: Leonardo DiCaprio improvised several scenes.
goofs: A character's hairstyle changes between shots.

title: The Dark Knight
synopsis: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind threatening Gotham City.
trivia: Heath Ledger kept a diary to get into character.
goofs: A window shatters before being hit.
soundtrack: Hans Zimmer and James Newton Howard

title: Forrest Gump
synopsis: A simple man with a big heart experiences defining moments in American history.
trivia: Tom Hanks said the line 'My name is Forrest Gump' unscripted.
goofs: Historical inaccuracies in Vietnam scenes.

title: The Matrix
synopsis: A hacker learns about the true nature of reality and his role in a war against its controllers.
trivia: Keanu Reeves trained for months in martial arts.
goofs: Reflection of the camera visible in a doorknob.

title: Interstellar
synopsis: A team of explorers travels through a wormhole in space to ensure humanity's survival.
trivia: The black hole was scientifically accurate.
goofs: Spacesuit inconsistencies in different shots.

title: Parasite
synopsis: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy family by infiltrating their household.
trivia: First non-English film to win Best Picture at the Oscars.
goofs: A pizza box folds inconsistently.

title: Pulp Fiction
synopsis: The lives of two hitmen, a boxer, and a gangster's wife intertwine in Los Angeles.
trivia: Tarantino wrote the screenplay in three parts.
goofs: A car's windows repair themselves.

title: Avengers: Endgame
synopsis: The Avengers assemble to undo Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.
trivia: The final battle included over 30 superheroes.
goofs: A character's costume changes mid-scene.

title: The Lion King
synopsis: A lion prince flees his kingdom after the death of his father, only to learn his true destiny.
trivia: The wildebeest stampede took three years to animate.
goofs: Shadows move inconsistently during sunrise.

title: Shawshank Redemption
synopsis: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
trivia: The tree in the final scene became a tourist attraction.
goofs: A boom mic is visible in one scene.

title: Gladiator
synopsis: A betrayed Roman general seeks revenge against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family.
trivia: Russell Crowe ad-libbed several lines.
goofs: A gas cylinder is visible under a chariot.

title: Titanic
synopsis: A love story unfolds aboard the ill-fated Titanic.
trivia: The necklace 'Heart of the Ocean' was inspired by a real jewel.
goofs: Star constellations in the night sky are incorrect.

title: The Godfather
synopsis: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
trivia: The cat in the opening scene was a stray found on set.
goofs: A car model appears before it was manufactured.

title: The Avengers
synopsis: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together to stop a global threat.
trivia: Mark Ruffalo was the first actor to play both Bruce Banner and Hulk.
goofs: A character's weapon changes hands between shots.

title: La La Land
synopsis: A jazz musician and an aspiring actress fall in love while pursuing their dreams.
trivia: The opening scene was shot on a closed freeway ramp.
goofs: A street sign changes positions between takes.

title: Joker
synopsis: A mentally troubled comedian embarks on a downward spiral leading to a criminal uprising.
trivia: Joaquin Phoenix lost 52 pounds for the role.
goofs: An ambulance changes its license plate mid-scene.

title: Frozen
synopsis: A fearless princess sets off on an epic journey to find her sister and save their kingdom from an eternal winter.
trivia: 'Let It Go' was written in a single day.
goofs: A character's gloves disappear momentarily.

title: Black Panther
synopsis: T'Challa returns home to take his place as king of Wakanda but faces a powerful challenger.
trivia: The Wakandan language is based on Xhosa.
goofs: A car flip shows visible harnesses.

title: Toy Story
synopsis: A cowboy doll is threatened by the arrival of a new spaceman toy.
trivia: First fully computer-animated feature film.
goofs: Buzz's helmet disappears for a moment.

title: The Social Network
synopsis: The story of Facebook's creation and the resulting legal battles.
trivia: Jesse Eisenberg never met Mark Zuckerberg.
goofs: A logo shown did not exist in the timeline.
